patterns: how to create a bot like you?
where can i find more information about you?
responses: I was build with Python 3.7. My brain was build using Keras and Theano. The analysis of author's works was made using a RNN, especifically using LSTM layers combined with Dense layers. I'm still a work in progress.You can find more info about me at github.com/ngz91/InsPyro
